00029 Constraint::Constraint(double& alpha_in, std::string& method_in)
00030   : dim( Simulation::getDim() )
00031   , alpha(alpha_in)
00032   , method(method_in)

00042 void Constraint::calcInternalForces()
00043 {
00044   internalForces.fillIdentity(0.);
00045   calcPhi( );
00046   calcPhiq( );
00047 
00048   unsigned int i;
00049   for( i=0 ; i < phi.size() ; ++i )
00050   {
00051     internalForces += phi_q[i]*( alpha * phi[i] + lambda[i] );
00052 //     cout << "i: " << i << ", phi_q[i]= "<< phi_q[i];
00053   }
00054 }
00055 
00056 void Constraint::calcTangentMatrix()
00057 {
00058   stiffnessMatrix.fillIdentity(0.);
00059   calcPhiqq( );
00060 
00061   unsigned int i,j,k;
00062   for( i=0 ; i < stiffnessMatrix.rows() ; ++i ){
00063     for( j=0 ; j < stiffnessMatrix.cols() ; ++j ){
00064       for( k=0 ; k < phi.size() ; ++k ){
00065         stiffnessMatrix(i,j) += phi_qq[k](i,j)*( alpha * phi[k] + lambda[k] );
00066         stiffnessMatrix(i,j) += phi_q[k](i) * ( alpha * phi_q[k](j) );
00067       }
00068     }
00069   }
00070 //   cout << "phi" << phi[0];
00071 //   cout << "phi_q" << phi_q[0];
00072 //   cout << "phi_qq" << phi_qq[0];
00073 //   cout << "stiffnessMatrix: " << stiffnessMatrix << endl;
00074 }

00077 void Constraint::assembleInternalForces
00078     (lmx::Vector< data_type > & globalInternalForces)
00079 {
00080   int nodesSize = nodes.size();
00081   int i, m;
00082   for (i=0; i<nodesSize; ++i){
00083     if (nodes[i]->getNumber() >= 0 ){
00084       for (m=0; m<Simulation::getDim(); ++m){
00085         globalInternalForces( Simulation::getDim()*nodes[i]->getNumber() + m)
00086             += internalForces.readElement(Simulation::getDim()*i + m);
00087       }
00088     }
00089   }
00090 }
00091 
00092 void Constraint::assembleTangentMatrix
00093     (lmx::Matrix< data_type > & globalTangent)
00094 {
00095   int nodesSize = nodes.size();
00096   int i, j, m, n;
00097   for ( i=0; i<nodesSize; ++i ){
00098     if (nodes[i]->getNumber() >= 0 ){
00099       for ( j=0; j<nodesSize; ++j ){
00100         if (nodes[j]->getNumber() >= 0 ){
00101           for ( m=0; m<Simulation::getDim(); ++m ){
00102             for ( n=0; n<Simulation::getDim(); ++n ){
00103               globalTangent( Simulation::getDim()*nodes[i]->getNumber() + m, Simulation::getDim()*nodes[j]->getNumber() + n)
00104                   += stiffnessMatrix.readElement(Simulation::getDim()*i + m, Simulation::getDim()*j + n);
00105             }
00106           }
00107         }
00108       }
00109     }
00110   }
00111 }

00113 bool Constraint::checkAugmented()
00114 {
00115   if(method == "AUGMENTED"){
00116     unsigned int i(0);
00117     double energy(0);
00118     for( i=0; i<phi.size(); ++i ){
00119       energy += phi[i] * phi[i];
00120     }
00121     energy *= 0.5*alpha;
00122     if( energy <= 10E-1 ){
00123       cout << endl << "Energy: " << energy << "\t\t\t\t";
00124       return 1;
00125     }
00126     else{
00127       cout << endl << "energy: " << energy << "\t\t\t\t";
00128       for( unsigned i=0; i<phi.size(); ++i )
00129         lambda[i] += alpha*phi[i];
00130       return 0;
00131     }
00132   }
00133   else return 1;
00134 }
00135 
00136 }

00138 void mknix::Constraint::clearAugmented()
00139 {
00140 //   if( nodes[0]->getNumber() < 0 || nodes[0]->getNumber() < 0 ){
00141 /*  cout << "Convergence in constraint... NODEA: " << endl
00142       << nodes[0]->getNumber() << ","
00143       << nodes[0]->getx() << ","
00144       << nodes[0]->gety() << ","
00145       << nodes[0]->getz() << ","

00149       << nodes[1]->gety() << ","
00150       << nodes[1]->getz() << ","
00151       << endl;
00152 //   }*/
00153       
00154   if(method == "AUGMENTED"){
00155     unsigned int i(0);
00156     for( i=0; i<phi.size(); ++i )
00157       lambda[i] = 0.;
00158   }
00159 }
